channel.title: Need help with a small hamachi error
channel.description:
Everytime i try to open up Hamachi i get this:
Configuration problem is mostly caused by your firewalling software blocking DHCP traffic on Ham. Adapt. Please make sure that UDP traffic from local port 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed. Alternively disable firewall on Ham. Adapt.
Does anyone know how to fix this =[

item.title: Need help with a small hamachi error
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

Best thing is go to your internet connection

config screen -> internet connections -> LAN -> right click and “domains” -> advanced -> settings -> add it

sorry if anything is wrong dutch you know

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a small hamachi error

item.title: Need help with a small hamachi error
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

[quote=“wooker, post:4, topic:82248”][quote author=surfer25 link=topic=120869.msg1185192#msg1185192 date=1177066303]
Or you can adjust you firewall setting to not block Hamachi
[/quote]Or do what hamachi said -> Please make sure that UDP traffic from local port 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed[/quote]
How do i do that?

Read full topic
